Texts.Eng: Bring the 10 ^orange;Methanol^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

So you now have an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; or ^orange;Hand Mill^reset;, but aren't sure what to do with it? It's simple, really. Go place it somewhere, and toss a bunch of ^green;logs^reset; in there. 10 should do. Create 2 ^orange;Methanol^reset; with them.
That, my friend, is how you make ^orange;Methanol^reset;. Now let's move on to ^orange;Cobblestone^reset;!
